mapper.select: select T1.TABLE_ID ,value(T1.TABLE_SCHEMA,'-9') TABLE_SCHEMA ,T1.TABLE_NAME ,T2.COLUMN_ID ,T2.COLUMN_NAME ,T4.LABEL_TYPE_ID ,value(trim(T2.DATA_TYPE),'-9') DATA_TYPE ,T3.LABEL_ID ,T1.UPDATE_CYCLE ,T3.COUNT_RULES_CODE ,T8.DATA_STATUS from $[SRC_TABLE_CI_MDA_SYS_TABLE] T1 inner join $[SRC_TABLE_CI_MDA_SYS_TABLE_COLUMN] T2 on T1.TABLE_ID = T2.TABLE_ID inner join $[SRC_TABLE_CI_LABEL_EXT_INFO] T3 on T2.COLUMN_ID = T3.COLUMN_ID inner join $[SRC_TABLE_CI_LABEL_INFO] T4 on T3.LABEL_ID = T4.LABEL_ID inner join $[SRC_TABLE_CI_APPROVE_STATUS] T5 on char(T4.LABEL_ID) = T5.RESOURCE_ID inner join $[SRC_TABLE_DIM_COC_LABEL_COUNT_RULES] T7 on T3.COUNT_RULES_CODE = T7.COUNT_RULES_CODE inner join ( select LABEL_ID,DATA_STATUS from $[SRC_TABLE_COC_LABEL_STATUS] where DATA_DATE=#{date} and DATA_BATCH <> #{batchNo} and DATA_STATUS <> $[STATUS_LABEL_RULE_FAIL] and DATA_STATUS <> $[STATUS_LABEL_RULE_RUNNING] ) T8 on T3.LABEL_ID=T8.LABEL_ID where date(T4.EFFEC_TIME) <= date('${effectDate}') and date(T4.FAIL_TIME) > date('${effectDate}') and T3.IS_STAT_USER_NUM = 1 and T4.LABEL_TYPE_ID in ($[LABEL_TYPE_ONE_DIM],$[LABEL_TYPE_ATTR]) and T3.COUNT_RULES_CODE is not null and length(trim(T3.COUNT_RULES_CODE)) != 0 and T7.COUNT_RULES_CODE is not null and T7.EFFECTIVE_TIME <= date('${effectDate}') and T7.INVALID_TIME > date('${effectDate}') $[LABEL_EFFEC_RULE_SQL] and T4.UPDATE_CYCLE=${tableCycle} and T2.DATA_TYPE is not null and T2.DATA_TYPE is not null order by T1.TABLE_ID
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM $[SRC_TABLE_DST_TABLE_STATUS] WHERE TABLE_ID =#{tableId} AND TABLE_TYPE =$[TABLE_TYPE_LABEL_CNT_TABLE] AND DATA_DATE =#{date} AND (STATUS_ID =$[STATUS_LABEL_DST_SEC] OR STATUS_ID =$[STATUS_LABEL_CNT_DST_SEC])
mapper.insert: insert into $[SRC_TABLE_DST_TABLE_STATUS] ( TABLE_ID, DATA_DATE, TABLE_TYPE, STATUS_ID, DATA_BATCH, PID ) values ( #{tableId}, #{date}, #{tableType}, #{statusId}, #{batchNo}, #{pid} )
mapper.update: UPDATE $[SRC_TABLE_COC_LABEL_STATUS] SET DATA_STATUS =$[STATUS_LABEL_CNT_FAIL], EXCEPTION_DESC =#{errMsg} WHERE DATA_STATUS =$[STATUS_LABEL_CNT_RUNNING] AND DATA_DATE =#{date} AND DATA_BATCH =#{batchNo} AND LABEL_ID IN ( SELECT LABEL_ID FROM $[SRC_TABLE_CI_LABEL_EXT_INFO] T1 INNER JOIN $[SRC_TABLE_CI_MDA_SYS_TABLE_COLUMN] T2 ON T1.COLUMN_ID=T2.COLUMN_ID WHERE T2.TABLE_ID =#{tableId} )

UPDATE $[SRC_TABLE_COC_LABEL_STATUS] SET DATA_STATUS =$[STATUS_LABEL_CNT_RUNNING], data_batch =#{batchNo}, DATA_INSERT_TIME =current timestamp, PID =#{pid} WHERE LABEL_ID IN (${labelId}) AND DATA_DATE =#{date} AND data_batch <> #{batchNo} AND DATA_STATUS IN ($[STATUS_LABEL_RULE_SEC],$[STATUS_LABEL_CNT_SEC],$[STATUS_LABEL_CNT_FAIL])
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ${tableName} ( op_time , city_id , BRAND_ID, VIP_LEVEL_ID ${fieldName} ) SELECT DATE('${date}'), city_id , BRAND_ID, VIP_LEVEL_ID ${sumStr} FROM ${srcTableName} GROUP BY BRAND_ID, VIP_LEVEL_ID, city_id
